topic.title: Processing Clipped Highlights
topic.shortdesc: Clipped highlights may occur when the dynamic ranger is greater than what your camera can capture or if the image is over exposed. [image of a histogram]

body.p: enable highlight reconstruction using color propagation, then push up the highlights slider.
enable tonemapping (optionally you can use CIECAM02 mode) and push down the [slider name].
enable Shadows and Highlights and [increase/decrease] the [slider names].
